ModMetaData.author: Topodic
ModMetaData.name: Forgettable Pumps
ModMetaData.description: Some mini-patches to make using moisture pumps a little more convenient: - Moisture pumps now alert you when they're at max radius. - Optionally, they can automatically designate themselves for deconstruction. If Minify Everything is installed, will designate to be uninstalled instead. - Optionally, as the radius expands, bridges you've placed on tiles that are now dry can be automatically marked for removal.
